GK16mamkpb_u:2379: krameṇodāharaṇam-- svapne 'pi samareṣu tvāṃ vijayaśrīrna muñcati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2382: sarasijamidamānanaṃ ca tasyāḥ samamiti cetasi saṃmadaṃ vidhatte // 393 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2384: śaurirbhujairiva caturbhiradaḥ sadā yo lakṣmīvilāsabhavanairbhuvanaṃ babhāra // 394 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2386: suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavānabhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya // 395 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2390: tathā jayaśrīstvadāsevanenetyādinā pratīyamānena vinā yadyapi noktervaicitryam,
GK16mamkpb_u:2395: rasādistu vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'laṃkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvaiva tadalaṃkārā udāhṛtāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2399: tadvat dharmasya lope syāt na śrautī taddhite punaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2403: udāharaṇam-- dhanyasyānanyasāmānyasaujanyotkarṣaśālinaḥ karaṇīyaṃ vacaśvetaḥ satyaṃ tasyāmṛtaṃ yathā // 397 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2407: viṣakalpaṃ mano vetsi yadi jīvasi tatsakhe // 399 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2411: dīsai aha va ṇisammai sarisaṃ aṃsaṃsametteṇa // 400 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2412: kavvassetyatra kavvasamamiti sarisamityatra ca ṇūṇamiti pāṭhe,
GK16mamkpb_u:2417: vāśabdaḥ, upamādyotaka iti vāderupamāpratipādakasya lope ṣaṭ samāsena sarmaṇo 'dhikaraṇāccotpannena kyacā kartuḥ kyaṅā karmakartrorupapadayorṇamulā ca bhavet //
GK16mamkpb_u:2422: pairaṃ sutīyati janaṃ samarāntare 'sāvantaḥ purīyati vicitracaritracuñcuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2423: nārīyate samārasīmni kṛpāṇapāṇerālokya tasya caritāni sapatnasenā // 403 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2429: udāharaṇam-- savitā vidhavati vidhurapi savitarati tathā dinanti yāminyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2459: iti bhenne ca tasmin ekasyaiva bahūpamānopādāne mālopamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2464: tasya sabheva jayaśrīḥ śakyā jetuṃ nṛpasya na pareṣām // 413 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2472: udāharaṇam-- na kevalaṃ bhāti nitāntakāntirniṃtambinī saiva nitambinīva /
GK16mamkpb_u:2483: udāharaṇam-- kamaleva matirmatiriva kamalā tanuriva vibhā vibheva tanuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2484: dharaṇīva dhṛcirdhṛtiriva dharaṇī satataṃ vibhāti bata yasya // 415 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2488: udārahaṇam-- unmeṣaṃ yo mama na sahate jātivairī niśāyām intorintīvaradaladṛśā tasya saundaryadarpaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2489: nītaḥ śāntiṃ prasabhamanayā vaktrakāntyeti harṣā- llagrā manye lalitatanu te pādayoḥ pajhalakṣmīḥ // 416 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2495: bhedīktau yathā ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2496: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti ciraṃ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ // 418 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2497: bhedhoktāvityanena na kevalamayaṃ niśvayagarbho yāvannisvayānto 'pi saṃdehaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2498: yathā induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametat kimambu kutra gatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2500: kiṃ tu niśvayagarbha iva nātra niśvayaḥ pratīyamāna iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:2502: tadanuktau yathā asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2503: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ // 420 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2513: yathā jyotsnābhasmacchuraṇadavalā bibhratī tārakāsthī- nyantardhānavyasanarasikā rātrikāpālikīyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2514: dvīpāddvīpaṃ bhramati dadhatī candarmudrākapāle nyastaṃ siddhāñjanaparimalaṃ lāñchanasya cchalena // 421 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2516: antardhānavyasanarasikatvamāropitadharma eveti rūpakaparigrahe sādhakamastīti tatsaṃkarāśaṅkā na kāryā //
GK16mamkpb_u:2521: yathā jassa raṇanteurae kare kuṇantassa maṇḍalaggalaam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2522: rasasaṃmuhī vi sahasā paraṃmuhī hoi riuseṇā // 422 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2523: atra raṇasyāntaḥpuratvamāropyamāṇaṃ śabdopātm maṇḍalāgralatāyāḥ nāyikātvam ripusenāyāśva pratināyikātvam arthasāmarthyādavasīyate, iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:2531: yathā kuraṅgīvāṅgāni stimitayati gītadhvaniṣu yat sakhīṃ kāntodantaṃ śrutamapi punaḥ praśrayati yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:2532: anidraṃ yaccāntaḥ svapiti tadaho vedmyabhinavāṃ pravṛtto 'syāḥ sektuṃ hṛdi manasijaḥ premalatikāma // 423 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2536: yathā saundaryasya taraṅgiṇī taruṇimotkarṣasya harṣodgamaḥ kānteḥ kārmaṇakarma narmarahasāmullāsanāvāsabhūḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2537: vidyā vakragirāṃ vidheranavadhiprāvīṇyasākṣātkriyā bāṇāḥ pañcaśilīmukhasya lalanācūḍāmaṇiḥ sā priyā // 424 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2540: tat paraṃparitaṃ śliṣṭe vācake bhedabhāji vā //95//
GK16mamkpb_u:2542: satyaprītividhānadakṣa vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma prabho sāmrājyaṃ varavīra vatsaraśataṃ vairiñcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ // 425 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2543: atra mānasameva mānasam kamalāyāḥ saṃkoca eva kamalānāmasaṃkocaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2544: durgāṇāmamārgaṇameva durgāyāḥ mārgaṇam samitāṃ svīkāra eva samidhāṃ svīkāraḥ satye prītireva satyāmaprītiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2547: yadyapi śabdārthālaṃkāro 'yamityuktam vakṣyate ca tathāpi prasiddhyanurodhādatroktaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2549: bhedabhāji yathā ālānaṃ jayakuñjarasya dṛṣadāṃ seturvipadvāridheḥ pūrvādriḥ karavālacaṇḍhamahaso līlopadhānaṃ śriyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2550: saṃgrāmāmṛtasāgarapramathanakrīḍāvidau mandaro rājan rājati vīravairivanitāvaidhavyadasate bhujaḥ // 426 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2555: niravadhi ca nirāśrayaṃ ca yasya sthitamanivartitakautukaprapañcam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2556: prathama iha bhavān sa kūrmamūrtirjayati caturdaśalokavallikandaḥ // 428 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2560: ityādi raśanārūpakaṃ na vaicitryavaditi na lakṣitam //
GK16mamkpb_u:2563: upameyam asatyaṃ kṛtvopamānaṃ satyatayā yat sthāpyate sā tu, apahnutiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2564: udāharaṇam-- avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāhkasya vapuṣi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2565: amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyantaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi // 430 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2566: itthaṃ vā bata sakhi kiyadetat paśya vairaṃ smarasya priyavirahakṛśe 'smin rāgiloke tathā hi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2569: api tu sakālakūṭāḥ śarā iti pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2570: evaṃ vā amuṣmiṃllāvaṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛṣujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2571: yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ pratamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ // 432 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2579: udāharaṇam-- udayamayate diṅbhālinyaṃ nirākurutetarām nayati nidhanaṃ nidrāmudrāṃ pravartayati kriyāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2580: racayatitarāṃ svairācārapravartanakartanam vata bata lasattejaḥpuñjo vibhāti vibhākaraḥ // 433 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2584: prakṛtārthapratipādakavākyena śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇamāhātmayāt na tu viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādapi yat aprakṛtasyārthasyābhidhānam sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇārthadvayakathanāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2585: udāharaṇam--lahiūṇa tujjha bāhuphphaṃsaṃ jīe sa ko vi ullāso /
GK16mamkpb_u:2586: jaalacchī tuha virahe ṇa hūjjalā dubbalā ṇaṃ sā // 434 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2592: udāharaṇam-- kvasūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2594: atra, uḍupena sāgarataraṇamiva manmatyā sūryavaṃśavarṇanamityupamāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2595: yathā vā udayati vitatordhvaraśmirajjāvahimarucau himadhāmni yāti cāstam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2597: atra kathamanyasya līlāmanyo vahatīti tatsadṛśīmityupamāyāṃ paryavasānam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2599: meruṃ lilaṅghayiṣati dhruvameṣa deva yaste guṇān gaditumudyamamādadhāti // 437 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2605: yathā unnataṃ padamavāpya yo laghurhelayaiva sa patediti bruvan /
GK16mamkpb_u:2613: kārye nimitte sāmānye viśeṣe prastute sati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2616: krameṇodāharaṇam-- yātā kiṃ na milanti sundari punaśvintā tvayā matkṛte no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāsi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2617: lajjāmantharatārakeṇa nipatatpītāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā māṃ hasitena bhāvimaraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ // 439 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2618: atra prasthānātkimiti nivṛtto 'sīti kārye pṛṣṭe kāraṇamabhihitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2619: rājantarājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2620: ityaṃ nātha śukastāvāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarāt citrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābāṣate // 440 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2621: atra prasthānodyataṃ bhavantaṃ jñātvā sahasaiva tvadarayaḥ palāyya gatāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2623: etattasya mukhātkiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2624: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanaiḥ kutroḍḍīya gato mametyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā // 441 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2625: atrāsthāne jaḍānāṃ mamatvasaṃbhāvanā bhavatīti sāmānye prastute viśeṣaḥ kathitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2627: sa eva pūjyaḥ sa pumānsa nītimānsujīvitaṃ tasya sa bhājanaṃ śriyaḥ // 442 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2628: atra “kṛṣṇaṃ nihatya narakāsuravadhūnāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ praśamayasi tat tvameva ślāghyaḥ';
GK16mamkpb_u:2631: śleṣaḥ samāsoktiḥ sādṛśyamātraṃ vā tulyāt tulyasya hyākṣepe hetuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2632: krameṇodāharaṇam-- puṃstvādapi pravicalet yadi yadyadho 'pi yāyāt yadi praṇayane namahānapi syāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:2633: abhyuddharettadapi viśvamitīdṛśīyaṃ kenāpi dik prakaṭitā puruṣottamena // 443 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2634: yenāsyabhyuditena candra gamitaḥ klāntiṃ ravau tatra te yujyeta pratikartumeva na punastasyaiva pādagrahaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2635: kṣīṇenaitadanuṣṭhitaṃ yadi tataḥ kiṃ lajjase no manāg astvenaṃ jaḍadhāmatā tu bhavato yad vyāmni visphūrjase // 444 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2636: ādāya vāri paritaḥ saritāṃ mukhebhyaḥ kiṃ tāvadarjitamanena durarṇavena /
GK16mamkpb_u:2637: kṣārīkṛtaṃ ca vaḍavādahane hutaṃ ca pātālakukṣikuhare viniveśitaṃ ca // 445 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2638: iyaṃ ca kācit vācye pratīyamānārthānadhyāropeṇaiva bhavati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2639: yathā abdherambhaḥ sthagitabhuvanābogapātālakukṣeḥ potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghane 'pi kṣamante /
GK16mamkpb_u:2640: āho riktaḥ kathamapi bhavedeṣa daivāt tadānīṃ ko nāma syādavaṭakuharālokane 'pyasya kalpaḥ // 446 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2642: yathā kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2643: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevate na cchāyāpi paropakārakaraṇe mārgasthitasyāpi me // 447 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2645: yathā so 'pūrvo rasanāviparyayavidhiḥ tat karṇayośvāpalaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadik kiṃ bhūyakoktena vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2646: sarvaṃ vismṛtavānasi bhramara he yadvāraṇo 'dyāpyasau antaḥśūnyakaro niṣevyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ // 448 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2647: atra rasanāviparyāsaḥ śūnyakaratvaṃ ca bhramarasyāsevane na hetuḥ karṇacāpalaṃ tu hetuḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2655: yathā kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām /
GK16mamkpb_u:2659: yathā aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇā via kā vi vattaṇacchāā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2660: sāmā sāmaṇṇapaāvaiṇo reha ccia ṇa hoī // 450 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2663: uktau yat kalpanam (arthāt asaṃbhavino 'rthasya) sā tṛtīyā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2666: kāraṇasya śīghrakāritāṃ vaktuṃ kāryasya pūrvamuktau caturthī /
GK16mamkpb_u:2674: upamānavākye ca kathitapadasya duṣṭatayābhihitatvāt śabdabhedena yat upādīyate sā vastuno vākyārthasyopamānatvāt prativastūpamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2675: yathā devībhāvaṃ gamitā parivārapadaṃ kathaṃ bhajatveṣā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2677: yadi dahatyanalo 'tra kimadbhutaṃ yadi ca gauravamadriṣu kiṃ tataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2683: eteṣāṃ sādhāraṇadharmādīnāma dṛṣṭo 'ntaḥ niśvayo yatra sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2684: tvayi dṛṣṭa eva tasyā nirvāti mano manobhavajvalitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2687: vaidharmyeṇa tu tavāhave sāhasakarmaśarmaṇaḥ karaṃ kṛpāṇāntikamāninīṣataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2694: ekavārameva yat upādīyate tat ekasthasyaiva samastavākyadīpanāt dīpakam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2695: yathā kivaṇāṇaṃ dhaṇaṃ ṇāāṇaṃ phaṇamaṇī keśarāiṃ sīhāṇaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2698: yathā svidyati kūṇati vellati vicalati nimiṣati vilokayati tiryak /
GK16mamkpb_u:2704: yathā saṃgrāmāṅgaṇamāgatena bhavatā cāpe samāropite devākarṇaya yena yena sahasā yadyatsamāsāditam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2705: kodaṇḍena śarāḥ śarairariśirastenāpi bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatraḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatrayam // 459 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2709: krameṇodāharaṇam-- pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2716: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo 'bhivardhate satyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2717: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu // 462 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2718: ityādānupamānasyopameyādādhikyamiti kenaciduktam tadayuktam atra yauvanagatāsthairyādhikyaṃ hi vivakṣitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2732: atraiva tuccheti mahādhṛterityanayoḥ paryāyeṇa yugapadvānupādāne 'nyat bhedatrayam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2754: atra tulyārthe vatiḥ viṣamādayaśva śabdāḥ śliṣṭāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2759: yūnāmatīva pibatāṃ rajanīṣu yatra tṛṣṇāṃ jahāra madhu nānanamaṅganānām // 470 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2760: atrevādīnāṃ tulyādīnāṃ ca padānāmabhāve 'pi śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇairākṣiptaivopamā pratīyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2761: evaṃjātīyakāḥ śliṣṭoktiyogyasya padasya pṛthagupādāne 'nye 'pi bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16mamkpb_u:2767: aśakyavaktavyatvamatiprasiddhatvaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vaktuṃ niṣedho niṣedha iva yaḥ sa vakṣyamāṇaviṣaya uktaviṣayaśveti dvidhā, ākṣepaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2768: krameṇodāharaṇam-- e ehi kiṃpi kīevi kaeṇa ṇikviva bhaṇāmi alamaha vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2770: jyotsnā mauktikadāma candanarasaḥ śītāṃśukāntadravaḥ karpūraṃ kadalī mṛṇālavalayānyambhojinīpallavāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2771: anyarmānasamāstvayā prabhavatā tasyāḥ sphuliṅgotkara- vyāpārāya bhavanti inta hanta kimanenoktena na brūmahe // 472 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2784: krameṇodārahaṇam-- nidrānivṛttāvudite dyuratne sakhījane dvārapadaṃ parāpte /

GK16mamkpb_u:3406: atrāpi jvalantyo 'mbudhārāḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣpatantyo na saṃbhavantītyupanibadhyamāno 'rtho 'naucityameva puṣṇāti //
GK16mamkpb_u:3407_0: utprekṣāyāmapi saṃbhāvanaṃ dhruvevādaya eva śabdā vaktuṃ sahante na yathāśabdo 'pi
GK16mamkpb_u:3407_1: kevalasyāsya sādharmyameva pratipādayituṃ paryāptatvāt tasya cāsyāmavivakṣitatvāditi
GK16mamkpb_u:3410: utprekṣitamapi tācvikena rupeṇa parivarjitatvāt nirupākhyaprakhyam tatsamarthanāya yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālokhyamiva gaganatale 'tyantamasamīcīnamiti nirviṣayatvametasya,
GK16mamkpb_u:3412: yathā divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītamivāndhakāram /
GK16mamkpb_u:3413: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva // 600 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3414: atrācetanasya tamaso divākarāttrāsa eva na saṃbhavatīti kuta eva tatprayojitamadriṇā paritrāṇam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3415: saṃbhāvitena tu rūteṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti vyartha eva tatsamarthanāyāṃ yatnaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3417: upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ punaruktaṃ vā doṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3418: yathā spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karairdayitayeva vijṛmbhitatāpayā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3420: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca yathā sadṛśaviśeṣaṇavaśena vyaktiviśeṣaparigraheṇa ca nāyakatayā nāyikātvena ca vyaktiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3421: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratīnāyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
GK16mamkpb_u:3423: yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3427: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3428: yathā āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vāvasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3429: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatacvāntaram // 603 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3430: a6, acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3435: ityeṣa mārgo viduṣāṃ vibhinno 'pyabhinnarūpaḥ pratimāsate yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:3436: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//
